alert.note: Alert for Rogers (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 3:15AM CDT until April 05 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL CRAIG...NORTHEASTERN ROGERS AND SOUTHEASTERN NOWATA COUNTIES... At 315 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Watova, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Vinita... Nowata... New Alluwe... Watova... White Oak... Hollow... Pyramid Corners... Centralia... Centrailia... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 286 and 292. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
